catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 608
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: flat bottom; bulbous, slightly flattened bottom section; vertical wide neck with ribs; pair of irregular blocky handles; thick inverted mouth ring; entire piece intentionally asymmetrical/misshapen/slightly collapsed, with broken incised wavy line on bottom section and inherent cracking; green, light brown and tan glaze; brown lacquer cover with faceted top knob
medium: Iga ware; stoneware with natural ash glaze; lacquer cover
title: "Burst bag" Freshwater Jar
